sourcesContent:
<template>
    <van-button
        :icon="value ? 'star' : 'star-o'"
        :class="{ collored: value }"
        @click="onShoucang"
        :loading="loading"
    ></van-button>
    <!-- <van-icon color="#777" name="star-o" /> -->
</template>

<script>
import { addShoucang, delShoucang } from "@/api/users";
export default {
    name: "collected-btn",
    data(){
        return {
            loading:false,
        }
    }
};
</script>
<style lang="less" scoped>
.collored {
  color: #ffa500;
}
</style>
